show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.

title: Obesity
content:
Prescriptions for Health 9/10/12: Stanford University’s Hatchet Job on Organic Foods Can Obesity affect Cognitive... <!--more--> Function in Adolescents?
How a Pregnant mom’s Habits can Lead to Obesity in her Child How the values of the affluent and the poor differ when Reacting to Stress and Chaos.
Does Appearance Mean More to Young Adults than their Health?
Vicki’s 20:20 Health Tips: Why you Should use Coconut Oil Delicious ideas for a Liquid or Pureed Diet Caller: Helen (FL): Great points on pesticides and ideas for government subsidizing organic healthy foods
